entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
